channel.title: Lifepo4 on Cross Dominant
channel.description: Recent content in Lifepo4 on Cross Dominant

item.title: I may have over-blinged my NodeConf EU badge
item.description: If you attended NodeConf EU 2017 in Kilkenny, Ireland, you’ll know all about the digital badge powered by Espruino that we created with Gordon Williams. You can read more about it on the nearForm blog and check out the docs site. I hope you’ve continued to learn about Espruino and the power of JavaScript on tiny microcontrollers. Don’t forget it’s entirely Open Source Software and Hardware. Our Github repo is here.
